diff.name: FactionGoal_SurgicalStrike

replace.sel: //do_if[@value='player.age - @$LastSurgicalTime gt this.$MinInterval and $Faction != faction.hatikvah and (this.$IsPirate or $ClaimedSectors.count gt 0) and $WarScalar gt 0.3']/@value

diff.replace: player.age - @$LastSurgicalTime gt this.$MinInterval and (this.$IsPirate or $ClaimedSectors.count gt 0) and $WarScalar gt 0.3
